insert into patient_assay_back_common (id, fk_patient_id, assay_month, item_code, result, fk_tenant_id, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id)
select #{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.fkPatientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.assayMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} from dual
mapper.select: SELECT p.name ,item_code,result from patient_assay_back_common padc LEFT JOIN patient p on padc.fk_patient_id = p.id where padc.assay_month = '2017-07' and padc.fk_tenant_id = 10101
